response.original_title: Marv: The Soul of Five Star Basketball Camp
response.overview: Capturing him in action using the methods he employed to school National Basketball Association greats such as Michael Jordan, this 90-minute documentary profiles coach Marv Kessler, who's trained cagers at his Five Star Basketball Camp for 35 years. Unapologetically gruff, Kessler imparts his wisdom to high school and college players, teaching them the importance of teamwork on the hardwoods -- and off the court.
response.title: Marv: The Soul of Five Star Basketball Camp
